content.question: Which of the following is a benefit to using a random sample for an observational study?

choices.label: The random sample allows for different treatments to be assigned.
A causal relationship can be determined.
The results of the observational study can be generalized to the population.
A random sample is the easiest method of data collection.
The distribution of the sample will match the distribution of the population.

content.answer: The results of the observational study can be generalized to the population.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
